chapter.title: Hardware Requirements
chapter.para: The use of Scenic require specific hardware. Telepresence system oriented for realtime performance have to met certain standard, this for good reliability and performance. Our team is continuously testing various devices and computer parts. We frequently update this page with material that is adequate to use in a telepresence system. For any material that is not proposed in our list, please contact us.
chapter.sect1:

Medium Performance Computer Specification

sect2.title: Graphic Card
sect2.para:
The graphic card will manage your video output. The choice of your graphic card will depend on how you want to use Scenic. For now, we only support nvidia video card. Some ATI cards have problems with Xvideo extension. Before choosing your graphic card, determine on wich linux distribution and releases you are.
Some graphic card may work only on certain releases. Before buying a graphic card, verify on the nvidia unix page that the hardware you are planning to use is supported not only by your linux distribution but also on the release you are using.
